title: jmri-json-car-client-message
description: Schema data object in message from client to JMRI for type "car"

name.description: Operations id of the car being requested

built.description: Month and year car was built in MM-YY, MM-YYYY, or YYYY format

addComment.description: Additional pickup instructions or an empty string if none

removeComment.description: Additional drop instructions or an empty string if none

caboose.description: True if the car is to be treated as a caboose; false otherwise

fred.description: True if the car contains a FRED; false otherwise

hazardous.description: True if the load is considered hazardous; false otherwise

kernel.description: The name of the kernel this car is associated with

length.description: Current car length for available siding calculations

load.description: The load in the car (may also be the localized E (Empty) or L (Load)

outOfService.description: True if out of service; false otherwise

locationUnknown.description: True if car is lost, false otherwise

passenger.description: True if the car is a passenger vehicle; false otherwise

isLocal.description: True if the car is being moved locally; false otherwise

rfid.description: RFID tag attached to car; null if none

whereLastSeen.description: The location of the last reported sighting of the tag

whenLastSeen.description: The timestamp of the last reported sighting of the tag

location.description: The current location of the car

utility.description: True if the car is shown as a utility car on manifests; false otherwise

trainId.description: null to remove car from its train

trainName.description: name of train car is assigned to, null if not assigned

trainIconName.description: icon name of train car is assigned to, null if not assigned

destination.description: the current destination of the car

finalDestination.description: the final destination of the car

returnWhenEmpty.description: The location to return the car to when empty or null

returnWhenLoaded.description: The location to return the car to when loaded or null

status.description: The status symbol of the car

weight.description: Adjusted weight of car in tons
